vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἀμών, ὁ indecl. (Heb. אָמוֹן),
Amon, King of Judah: Mat.1:10 (Rec.).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.21.18;
son of: Manasseh (H4519H) and Meshullemeth (H4922); married to Jedidah (H3040);
father of: Josiah (H2977); also called Amos at Mat.1.10;
§ Amon, "trustworthy"
Amon, "trustworthy"
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞們 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "建造者"
猶太的國王之一, 瑪拿西之子, 約西亞之父(太 1:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚们 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "建造者"
犹太的国王之一, 玛拿西之子, 约西亚之父(太 1:10)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: A-môn « quan thiệp với dân tộc », con của Ma-na-se, một vua của Giu-đa. H526
